idea-plugin.name: Falcon Relax Eyes Light Theme
idea-plugin.description:
A protect your eyesight themes

If you work in a bright environment for long periods of time, a light-colored theme is recommended.
Falcon Relax Eyes theme might be a better choice for you.

Basic features in Falcon Relax Eyes Themes :
  • Work with both **New UI** and **Classic UI**
  • Well-balanced colors, easy on eyes
  • Better syntax highlight
  • Unified and clean themes style
  • Lightweight and low impact on IDE performance

Falcon Relax Eyes Light themes (for bright environments):
  • Relax Celadon Light
  • Relax Green Light
  • Relax Green Light Contrast
  • Relax Grey Light
  • Relax Pink Light

Falcon Relax Eyes Dark themes (for low-light environments):
  • Relax Dark
  • Relax Dark Darcula
  • Relax Dark Blue
  • Relax Dark Green
  • Relax Dark Violet

For light themes, IDEA's default editor color scheme is also available:
  • Relax Celadon Light - idea default editor color scheme
  • Relax Celadon Light Colorful - theme default
  • Relax Green Light - idea default editor color scheme
  • Relax Green Light Colorful - theme default
  • Relax Green Light Contrast - idea default editor color scheme
  • Relax Green Light Contrast Colorful - theme default
  • Relax Grey Light - idea default editor color scheme
  • Relax Grey Light Colorful - theme default
  • Relax Pink Light - idea default editor color scheme
  • Relax Pink Light Colorful - theme default
